## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### Windows
1. Download `QuillEditor-Setup-{{version}}.exe`
2. Run the installer
3. Launch QuillEditor from Start Menu or Desktop

### macOS
1. Download `QuillEditor-{{version}}.dmg`
2. Open the DMG and drag QuillEditor to Applications
3. Launch from Applications (right-click â†’ Open if Gatekeeper blocks)

### Linux
**AppImage:**
```bash
chmod +x QuillEditor-{{version}}.AppImage
./QuillEditor-{{version}}.AppImage
